did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: George Walter Shute, born 1876, served as District Attorney of Gila County, Arizona from 1908-1912. The collection includes letters, chiefly relating to his activities as District Attorney.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Correspondence of George Walter Shute (AZ 026). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: George Walter Shute, born 1876, served as District Attorney of Gila County, Arizona from 1908-1912.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection includes letters, chiefly relating to his activities as District Attorney. Includes material concerning civic activities in Globe and land litigation in the area of Roosevelt Dam.
